house_listing.house_location: 7 HANEY TRACE, BAY COUNTRY Horseshoe Bay, TEXAS 78657
house_listing.house_description: 5.45 acres in gated Bay Country. Hilltop views. Stone and brick entrance with controlled access. Each tract highlighted by a stone column entry. Concrete ribbon curbing. Underground utilities in place. Horses allowed. Lot 8 also available.

highlights.item: Country living in a resort atmosphere.
Eight miles of stunning white three-rail fencing.
Wooded creeks, ponds, and spectacular views.
